Meet Our Founders

Business Development

Jon Kuperman has been designing and selling websites professionally for the past 2 years. He specializes in Customer Relations, Application Development and Project Management.

Jon started developing websites in 2010, and has since been given the opportunity to design websites for some of businesses that make Ann Arbor special. He has taught classes on web platforms and is always working to better himself.

Front-End Designer

Kelly King is a front-end designer pursuing a Master's degree in Computer Science. She specializes in Graphic Design, Typography and User Interfaces.

Kelly started developing websites in 2010 as well, and has done design work for many businesses and non-profits in the Michigan area
